Package game.actions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AOEAttackAction
    given an initial target, list of exits and optionally a weapon the Area of Attack Action or AOE for short performs an attack action with given weapon or the actors intrinsic weapon on all adjacent locations to the actor on the execute method
    AttackAction
    An Action to attack another Actor.
    BoneReviveAction
    revives a pile of bones back to their skeletal class
    BuyAction
    An action to buy an item or weapon
    ClimbCliffAction
    Action for climbing cliffs
    ConsumeRunesAction
    An action to consume golden runes and gain a random amount of runes
    DeathAction
    An action executed if an actor is killed.
    DespawnAction  
    DrinkFlaskAction
    Action to drink from the flask of crimson tears and reset actors health
    GoldenGateAction  
    MapAction  
    PickUpLostRunesAction
    Action to pick up lost runes and deposit them into the actor
    QuickStepAction
    Special Action for the Great Knife.
    RestAction
    Action to rest the actor and send them back to their last resting location
    SellAction
    An action to sell an item or weapon
    TradeWeaponAction
    An action to trade an item or weapon for another weapon
    UnsheatheAction
    Special Action for the Uchigatana.
